shortdesc.ph: Decoding type of the received audio.

plentry.pd: 0: The original sound intensity, the so-called dry signal, with a value range of [-20,10], and the unit is dB.
1: Early reflection signal strength, the so-called wet signal, with a value range of [-20,10], and the unit is dB.
The room size of the reflection. The value is between 0 and 100.
3: The initial delay length of the wet signal, the value range is [0,200], and the unit is milliseconds.
Integer only. The value range is [0,100].
